Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce

Class TestMultiTableInputFormat

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.MultiTableInputFormatTestBase
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TestMultiTableInputFormat
public class TestMultiTableInputFormat extends MultiTableInputFormatTestBase
Tests various scan start and stop row scenarios. This is set in a scan and tested in a MapReduce job to see if that is handed over and done properly too.
